title: Ticket #155: CondorPersonal.pm hangs if no COLLECTOR in DAEMON_LIST
description:
I'm testing a test. I know my test does not need a collector, so I didn't bother setting one up in my condor_config. I'm now using the condor_config with CondorPersonal.pm. Unfortunately CondorPersonal.pm checks in an infinite loop for the collector to appear (IsRunningYet(), CondorPersonal.pm:1295). This took a while to debug.

Possible improvements:

  • After waiting for "a while", emit a fatal error. "Could not find collector's address; it may not be running. CondorPersonal requires a collector be configured.
  • Check DAEMON_LIST, and if COLLECTOR isn't there, emit a fatal error.
  • Check DAEMON_LIST, and if COLLECTOR isn't there, add it automatically.

There is almost certainly an identical problem with the negotiator, and perhaps other daemons.
